title: Cognitive Learning Principles-based Intervention Program for Secondary Students with Mathematics Learning Difficulties

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Aims to improve the quantitative skills required for job performance among professionals. Blended operation combining smartphone-based learning materials and weekly face-to-face sessions

learning_goals: Learners improve accuracy in solving integer operation problems by over 30% through explicit systematic instruction.
Learners develop mathematical concept connectivity skills to a level of 0.7 (on a 5-point scale) through activities applying Cognitive Learning Principles (CLP).
Learners achieve over 80% of weekly learning outcomes through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
